monsterFluff.name: Giant Zombie Constrictor Snake
entries: 这些巨大的、腐烂的外壳是活生生的、中等大小的缢杀者，当时元老们带着它们来纪念和诱惑Kyrilla分享她的知识和力量。它们以祈求者和囚犯为食，长成了巨大的体型，其中许多人的骨头在巢穴的其他地方都能找到。当元老们反对Kyrilla时，他们与这些蛇战斗并杀死了它们--但却发现它们在Kyrilla的巢穴中通过受诅咒的环境魔法再次滑行。
缢杀者如果离开巢穴就会死亡。

monsterFluff.name: Hamish Hewland
entries: 哈米什是一个温柔的巨人，有着凶猛的笑声，他来自沃特迪普城。在他年轻的时候，他从来不是一个喜欢荒野的人，但他想要冒险。多年前，他加入了他的朋友希尔维尼和阿图拉的旅程，进入了剑海岸的荒野，和一个来自塞康伯的人类一起成为了他们冒险队伍的一员，他的名字叫沃坦恩-艾弗莱克。哈米什愿意冒着生命危险保护他的朋友，这一点从未受到怀疑。
哈米什拥有棕色皮肤，姿态优美，将长发梳成三个整齐的辫子。他是那种为冒险而超量打包的人。他的口袋里通常装满了零食或口粮。作为一个巨人，他的背包里同时带了一个地下工作者的包和一个探险家的包。他携带一把大斧头，适合他的体型。他还带着一面圆形的木质盾牌，是阿图拉专门为他做的，但已经腐烂成了碎片。

entries.name: 个性特征
entries: "我对没有走过的路很好奇，有时甚至是一种错误。我试图总是带着食物"。

entries.name: 理想
entries: "勇敢。我愿意为真正的朋友冒生命危险。事实上，我已经做到了！"

entries.name: 邦德
entries: "你选择的友谊可能比家庭更有意义。结交的朋友就是打败的敌人"。

entries.name: 缺陷
entries: "我经常相信人，以至于天真无邪。"

monsterFluff.name: Kyrilla, Accursed Gorgon
entries: Kyrilla的某些小部分希望她有一天能从她的不朽诅咒中得到赦免，但她的愤怒和怨恨已经超越了她的心，她能想象的逃离永恒的唯一方法是用她的顽强打动众神。她不想要怜悯，也不想要同情。她想让人害怕和厌恶，并不顾一切地继续生存下去。而现在，卡西孔已经死了，她独自一人，她不记得怜悯。

entries.name: 个性特征
entries: "我很快就会评判别人，发现他们不合格"。

entries.name: 理想
entries: "怨恨。尽管有神的诅咒，我还是活了下来--我不打算到外面的世界去，那里的傻瓜会试图杀死我。"

entries.name: 邦德
entries: "Kathikon是我一生的挚爱。其他任何人对我来说都不重要。"

entries.name: 缺陷
entries: "我从不承认我的错误。"

entries.name: Horrific Appearance
entries: Once, Kyrilla looked much like other gorgons of her world. Now, with her curse upon her, Kyrilla's healthy greenish skin has grown sickly pale, and the segmented cables she wore like hair have gone from shiny black to matte gray and green. Her legs became a long, segmented tail. Her eyes now glow green, bright enough to create dim light in front of her. She has grown four needle-like fangs in her mouth, and her hands have become slicing claws.
She reverts to her original appearance when she dies.

entries.name: Bestowed Power
entries: The malevolent powers bestowed to Kyrilla by her curse, as well as those given to her by the yuan-ti cult, are hardly of interest to her. She doesn't relish power but instead has taken to wallowing in misery and dwelling in her hatred for the beings that cursed her so long ago that she can hardly remember them.

entries.name: Magic Ring
entries: Kyrilla wears a ring of water walking that she was given by an emissary from the Serpent Kingdoms long ago. It is made of a bluish jade and does not reflect light.

entries.name: Immortal Curse
entries: Kyrilla does not require food or drink but does breathe and sleep.

monsterFluff.name: Skeletal Horror
entries: This horrid mass of bones clambers along on a dozen hands and feet without maintaining any consistent shape. One moment it moves like a centipede, the next it rears back to claw like a bear. The only consistent feature is a weird absence: no matter how many skulls make up its mass, this strange horror always seems to be headless.

The skeletal horrors in Kyrilla's lair are made from the bones of yuan-ti supplicants and cultists who came to learn her powers or, later, to steal them. She spared none of these intruders' lives, and in death their remains do her bidding.
